channel.title: Flotsam: Below (Thursdays in March, 7pm EST)
channel.description:
I've got 4 sessions of _Flotsam_ up for Thursday nights at 7:00 EDT in March. Come be outcasts and misfits in a space station with me!
Session 1, [date=2019-03-07 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LXkvHDmDhyDdkIvBw3W
Session 2, [date=2019-03-14 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LXkvRBY8kQH_9fNcPW9
Session 3, [date=2019-03-21 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LXkvarEzePd-tehZcR7
Session 4, [date=2019-03-28 time=19:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"] - https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LXkvmN-rYZqEJOxPueR
